name: Amstel
description: Amstel is a smooth, well-balanced lager with a crisp taste and subtle malt sweetness. Crafted with premium ingredients, it delivers a clean, refreshing finish—perfect for effortless, everyday sophistication.

name: Kingfisher Strong

name: Budweizer Magnum

name: Moonshine Lemon Tea Mead
description: Moonshine Lemon Tea Mead is a refreshing blend of smooth honey sweetness, zesty lemon, and subtle tea notes, finishing light, aromatic, and gently tangy.

description: Moonshine Apple Mead is a smooth, honey-based brew infused with crisp apple notes, offering balanced sweetness and a clean, refreshing finish.

description: CanaCraft Hemp Beer Mild Pint is a smooth and refreshing lager infused with subtle hemp notes, light malt character, and a crisp, clean finish.

description: Amstel Bier is a smooth and well-balanced lager with mild malt sweetness, gentle hop bitterness, and a crisp, refreshing finish.

description: Kingfisher Strong Pint is a bold, full-bodied lager with rich malt flavor, higher strength, and a smooth yet powerful finish.

description: Budweiser Magnum Strong Pint is a bold, high-strength lager with rich malt depth, pronounced body, and a smooth yet intense finish.

description: Carlsberg Elephant is a strong, full-bodied lager with rich malt sweetness, noticeable warmth, and a smooth yet powerful finish.

name: Tuborg Premium Strong
description: Tuborg Strong Pint is a bold, full-bodied lager with rich malt notes, balanced bitterness, and a smooth, powerful finish.

description: People’s Manipur Strong Pint is a bold, high-strength lager with rich malt character, smooth body, and a strong yet balanced finish.

name: Super Maka Strong
description: Maka Strong Pint is a robust, full-bodied lager with pronounced malt richness, higher strength, and a smooth, lingering finish.

description: Staylo Strawberry Vodka is a smooth and vibrant spirit infused with ripe strawberry flavors, offering a sweet, fruity aroma and a clean, refreshing finish.

description: Staylo Coconut Vodka is a smooth, tropical spirit infused with creamy coconut notes, offering a subtly sweet aroma and a clean, refreshing finish.

name: Salud Brut
description: Salud Brut Strong Pint is a bold, high-strength lager with crisp dryness, rich malt depth, and a smooth yet powerful finish.

name: Disco Panda Berry Blast
description: Disco Panda Berry Blast is a vibrant, fruit-forward drink bursting with juicy berry flavors, balanced sweetness, and a refreshingly smooth finish.

name: Bro red Scarlet
description: Bro Red Scarlet Strong Pint is a bold, high-strength lager with rich malt depth, a smooth body, and a strong, lingering finish.

name: Tank No. 90
description: Tank No. 90 Strong Pint is a powerful, high-strength lager with deep malt character, smooth body, and a bold, lasting finish.

name: Shotgun
description: Shotgun is a bold, high-strength lager with rich malt flavor, smooth body, and a powerful, lingering finish.

name: Disco Panda Lemon Shandy
description: Disco Panda Lemon Shandy is a light and refreshing blend of crisp beer and zesty lemon, offering bright citrus notes and a smooth, easy-drinking finish.

name: Absolut Vodka - Original
description: A premium bottle of Absolut Vodka showcased against a dark matte background with a subtle golden glow, highlighting its iconic blue branding and sleek, sophisticated design.

name: Absolut Citron Vodka
description: Absolut Citron Vodka is a smooth, premium lemon-flavored vodka with bright citrus notes and a clean, crisp finish — perfect for refreshing cocktails like the classic Cosmopolitan.

name: Absolut Elyx Vodka
description: Absolut Elyx is a luxury, single-estate vodka crafted from winter wheat and distilled in vintage copper stills. It offers a rich, silky mouthfeel with a smooth, full-bodied finish, presented in an elegant, ribbed glass bottle with refined copper accents.

name: Absolut Grapefruit Vodka
description: Absolut Grapefruit Vodka is a vibrant, citrus-forward spirit with fresh pink grapefruit flavor, offering a smooth, slightly sweet taste balanced by a crisp, refreshing finish — perfect for light, zesty cocktails.

name: Absolut Lime Vodka
description: Absolut Lime Vodka is a crisp and refreshing citrus-flavored vodka with bright notes of fresh lime peel and a smooth, clean finish — ideal for vibrant cocktails and easy mixed drinks.

name: Absolut Mandrin Vodka
description: Absolut Mandrin Vodka is a smooth, orange-flavored spirit with bright citrus notes of mandarin and sweet orange, delivering a balanced, refreshing taste perfect for lively cocktails.

name: Absolut Rasberri Vodka
description: Absolut Raspberri Vodka is a smooth, berry-infused spirit bursting with the natural sweetness and slight tartness of ripe raspberries, offering a rich, fruity flavor with a clean, refreshing finish.

name: Āmārā Pink Vodka
description: Āmārā Pink Vodka is a refined, blush-toned spirit crafted for smoothness and elegance. With its delicate fruity notes and clean finish, it offers a light, refreshing taste, beautifully presented in a sleek, modern bottle with gold accents for a premium touch.

name: Amateur Recipe 52 Vodka
description: Amateur Recipe 52 is a premium Indian vodka crafted for smoothness and purity. Distilled with precision and filtered multiple times, it delivers a clean, refined taste with a crisp finish, presented in a bold matte-black bottle that reflects its modern, sophisticated character.

name: AMG Carbon Vodka (Export)
description: AMG Carbon Vodka is a premium spirit filtered through activated carbon for exceptional smoothness and clarity. With its sleek matte-black bottle and modern design, it delivers a clean, crisp taste and refined finish, crafted for a bold and sophisticated drinking experience.

name: AMG Frizzen Vodka (Export)
description: AMG Frizzen Vodka is a premium grain spirit crafted for exceptional smoothness and purity. Carefully filtered for a clean, crisp character, it delivers a refined taste with a balanced finish, presented in a sleek frosted-white bottle that reflects its modern and sophisticated appeal.

name: AMG Mexican Lime (Export Infusion)
description: AMG Mexican Lime is a vibrant lime-infused spirit crafted for a refreshing and zesty experience. Bursting with bright citrus notes and a smooth, clean finish, it delivers a lively character perfect for chilled shots or energizing cocktails, presented in a bold green matte bottle that reflects its fresh, modern appeal.

name: AMG Smooth Vodka (Export)
description: AMG Smooth Vodka is a premium grain spirit crafted for exceptional purity and balance. Carefully filtered for enhanced smoothness, it delivers a clean, crisp taste with a refined finish, presented in a striking blue matte bottle that reflects its bold yet sophisticated character.

name: Arabella Guava Vodka
description: Arabella Guava Vodka is a fruity, tropical-infused spirit that blends smooth vodka with the sweet and slightly tangy flavor of ripe guava. Refreshing and vibrant, it offers a clean finish, making it perfect for chilled shots or creative cocktails.

name: Arabella Jamun Vodka
description: Arabella Jamun Vodka is a rich, fruit-infused spirit crafted with the bold, sweet-tart flavor of ripe jamun (Indian blackberry). Smooth and vibrant, it delivers a refreshing finish with deep berry notes, perfect for chilled shots or unique, flavorful cocktails.

name: Arabella Mango Vodka
description: Arabella Mango Vodka is a tropical fruit-infused spirit blending smooth vodka with the rich, juicy sweetness of ripe mangoes. Vibrant and refreshing, it delivers a mellow fruity character with a clean finish, making it ideal for chilled shots or exotic cocktails.

name: Baikal Premium Vodka
description: Baikal Premium Vodka is a refined spirit inspired by the purity of Lake Baikal. Crafted for smoothness and clarity, it delivers a clean, crisp taste with a balanced finish, presented in a distinctive bottle that reflects its premium character.

name: Beluga Celebration Vodka
description: Beluga Celebration Vodka is a premium Russian spirit crafted with exceptional precision and refinement. Known for its smooth, velvety texture and balanced finish, it delivers a clean and elegant taste, presented in a striking gold design that reflects luxury and sophistication.

name: Beluga Gold Line Vodka Gift Set
description: Beluga Gold Line is a luxury noble Russian vodka crafted with exceptional care and extended refinement. Known for its silky texture and smooth, balanced finish, this premium gift set includes the signature bottle along with branded accessories, presented in an elegant box that reflects sophistication and exclusivity.

name: Beluga Noble Vodka Export
description: Beluga Noble Vodka Export is a premium Russian vodka crafted with meticulous refinement for exceptional smoothness and clarity. Known for its soft, balanced character and clean finish, it delivers a refined drinking experience presented in an elegant, classic design that reflects its noble heritage.

name: Beluga Transatlantic Racing Vodka
description: Beluga Transatlantic Racing Vodka is a premium Russian spirit inspired by yachting excellence and crafted for exceptional smoothness. Refined and well-balanced, it offers a clean, crisp taste with a silky finish, presented in a sleek black and gold design that reflects elegance and performance.

name: Belvedere Vodka
description: Belvedere Vodka is a premium Polish vodka crafted from 100% rye and purified water, distilled with exceptional precision for a smooth and refined character. Known for its velvety texture and balanced finish, it delivers a clean, crisp taste that reflects its heritage of quality and craftsmanship.

name: Broken Heart Orange Classic Vodka
description: Broken Heart Orange Classic Vodka is a citrus-infused spirit crafted with vibrant orange notes and a smooth vodka base. Refreshing and lightly zesty, it delivers a balanced sweetness with a clean finish, making it ideal for lively cocktails or chilled shots.

name: Casimir Vodka
description: Casimir Vodka is a premium spirit crafted from organic winter wheat and distilled in India. Smooth and well-balanced, it offers a clean, refined taste with a crisp finish, presented in an elegant bottle that reflects its heritage and craftsmanship.

name: Crystal Skull Vodka
description: Crystal Skull Vodka is a premium spirit presented in a striking skull-shaped glass bottle. Crafted for smoothness and clarity, it delivers a clean, crisp taste with a refined finish, making it a bold statement piece for collectors and vodka enthusiasts alike.

name: elit Vodka
description: elit Vodka is an ultra-premium spirit crafted using a meticulous freeze-filtration process to achieve exceptional purity and smoothness. Known for its clean, refined character and crisp finish, it delivers a luxurious drinking experience presented in a sleek, modern bottle design.

name: Fire & Ice Vodka Original
description: Fire & Ice Vodka Original is a premium Swiss vodka crafted from alpine water for exceptional purity and smoothness. With its crisp, clean taste and balanced finish, it delivers a refined drinking experience, presented in a frosted bottle inspired by icy mountain peaks.

name: Fly Superior Vodka
description: Fly Superior Vodka is a premium spirit bottled in Switzerland, crafted for smoothness and refined taste. With its clean, crisp character and balanced finish, it delivers a sophisticated drinking experience, presented in a distinctive purple glass bottle that reflects elegance and quality.

name: Grey Goose Vodka
description: Grey Goose Vodka is a premium French vodka distilled and bottled in France using high-quality ingredients and meticulous craftsmanship. Known for its exceptionally smooth texture, subtle sweetness, and clean, crisp finish, it is ideal for sipping neat or elevating classic and contemporary cocktails.

name: Grey Goose Altius Vodka
description: Grey Goose Altius Vodka is an ultra-premium French vodka crafted with exceptional precision and elevated refinement. Distilled for remarkable purity and smoothness, it offers a silky texture with subtle notes and a crisp, clean finish. Presented in an elegant, elongated bottle design, it embodies sophistication and luxury for special occasions and premium cocktail experiences.

name: Haku Vodka
description: Haku Vodka is a premium Japanese craft vodka distilled from 100% Japanese white rice and filtered through bamboo charcoal for exceptional purity. Smooth, subtly sweet, and delicately rounded on the palate, it delivers a clean, refined finish that makes it perfect for sipping neat or enhancing elegant cocktails.

name: Hudka Himalayan Vodka
description: Hudka Himalayan Vodka is a premium Indian craft vodka made with Kumaoni local rice and pristine Himalayan spring water. Distilled for clarity and smoothness, it offers a clean, crisp taste with a soft, refined finish, reflecting the purity and character of the Himalayan region.

name: Husky Legend of the North Vodka
description: Husky Legend of the North Vodka is a premium cold-filtered vodka inspired by the purity and strength of northern landscapes. Smooth and crisp with a clean, balanced finish, it offers a refined drinking experience ideal for chilled shots or classic vodka cocktails.

name: Jazz Blue Curacao Vodka
description: Jazz Blue Curacao Vodka is a vibrant blue-hued spirit infused with the refreshing citrus character of curaçao. Smooth and lightly sweet with bright orange zest notes, it delivers a crisp finish and adds a striking color and flavor twist to cocktails and party drinks.

name: Juno Classic Pink Vodka
description: Juno Classic Pink Vodka is a stylish and vibrant spirit presented in an eye-catching frosted pink bottle. Smooth and easy-drinking, it offers a clean vodka character with a subtle fruity appeal, making it perfect for lively cocktails, party shots, and refreshing mixed drinks.

name: Juno Premium Grain Vodka
description: Juno Premium Grain Vodka is a smooth and refined spirit crafted from quality grains for a clean and balanced taste. Crisp on the palate with a subtle softness and gentle finish, it is versatile enough for classic cocktails or chilled shots, offering a straightforward yet premium vodka experience.

name: The Spirit of Kashmyr Indian Natural Vodka
description: The Spirit of Kashmyr Indian Natural Vodka is a refined vodka inspired by the purity of Kashmir. Crafted for a smooth and balanced character, it delivers a clean taste with subtle softness on the palate. Ideal for sipping neat or mixing into premium cocktails, it reflects elegance and regional authenticity.

name: The Spirit of Kashmyr Indian Saffron Vodka
description: The Spirit of Kashmyr Indian Saffron Vodka is a premium expression infused with the richness of saffron. Smooth and aromatic, it offers a delicate warmth with subtle floral and spice notes. Perfect for sophisticated cocktails or sipping chilled, it combines luxury with distinctive Indian character.

name: Ketel One Vodka
description: Ketel One Vodka is a premium Dutch vodka crafted with traditional distillation methods for exceptional smoothness and clarity. Known for its crisp finish and subtle citrus notes, it is perfect for classic cocktails or enjoying neat. A refined vodka made with attention to quality and heritage.

name: Khortytsa Cranberry Vodka
description: Khortytsa Cranberry Vodka blends premium vodka with vibrant cranberry flavor for a refreshing and slightly tart profile. Smooth and well-balanced, it delivers fruity notes with a clean finish. Perfect for lively cocktails or chilled shots.

name: Khortytsa Green Apple Vodka
description: Khortytsa Green Apple Vodka combines smooth premium vodka with crisp green apple flavor. Lightly sweet with a refreshing tang, it offers a clean and vibrant taste profile. Ideal for creative cocktails or enjoying chilled for a fruity twist.
